Element.name: ComplexGateway
Element.Description: A <a href="/Concepts/Elements/Process/Gateways/ComplexGateway"/> is used for handling complex conditions and situations
Element.Action: Change this gateway to a different gateway.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: The set of gateway parameters bound to the available action definition parameters.
The set of action definition parameters bound to the available target element parameters.
